component.name: getListById
component.description: Retrieves a list for a given Marketo list Id

component.name: getMultipleLists
component.description: Retrieves multiple lists with the given ids

component.name: addLeadsToList
component.description: Adds leads to a list with the given list id

component.name: memberOfList
component.description: Finds out if leads are a member of a given list

component.name: removeLeadsFromList
component.description: Removes a lead from a given list.
